entry.title: DW - Video - Louisiana Insurance Crisis
entry.summary: Natural disasters are sending insurance rates skyrocketing in many US coastal areas. Follow me to the south of Louisiana where the ongoing insurance crisis may force people to leave home.

entry.title: DW - US ammunition factories working overtime to supply Ukraine

link.title: DW - US ammunition factories working overtime to supply Ukraine

entry.summary: DW was granted rare access to one of just two US factories working overtime to keep up with soaring Ukrainian demand for weapons, the Ammunition Plant in Scranton, Pennsylvania. I went and saw shells stacked to the ceiling.

entry.title: DW - Studio talks SVB and ECB rate hikes

link.title: DW - Studio talks SVB and ECB rate hikes

entry.summary:
May gave me some studio time as the US regional bank SVB collapsed amongst rate increases of central banks globally. For me, studio time is explanation time: Most people don’t deal with finance stuff on a regular basis. But what finance and central banks do may be abstract but it is at the core of our society - they tender money. And I love telling stories around how that works.
